column4: can anyone help me with the ./configure and makeinstall thing?
./configure sets up options. if it gives errors you'll need to download packages for the dependancies mentioned or something. make compiles. make install puts things where they should be ;)
i know that so far, the only problem is installing it, cuz i have no idea how to do that
i got this thing called Screenlets and its a tar.gz2 file
that should extract it to a dir
then ./config, and note what it complains about
i have no ideo what tar zxvf /path/to/file.tar.gz
its a command. if you don't work that out you REALLY shouldn't be compiling things. also, do you have the build essential package installed?
so it should be tar (all those letters)  /home/thomas/Desktop/screenlets-0.0.10.tar.bz2
